headline.main: BELGRADE ADOPTS GUARDED ATTITUDE; Restates Neutrality but 'Hopes' Italo-Greek War Will Not Menace Interests LINK TO TURKS' STAND SEEN Declaration Is Held Counter to Axis Drive--Reich Said to Seek Soviet Accord Peace Held Wishful Thinking Stress Laid on Interests Bulgaria Reinforces Frontier Sees Reich Wooing Soviet REPORTS AXIS BID TO TURKS Swedish Writer Says Berlin Aims to Placate Ankara
